description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Prosciutto & Blue-Cheese Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Prosciutto & Blue-Cheese Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine lettuce, tomato and avocado in a bowl. Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard and honey in a jug. Add dressing to salad and toss to combine. Slice chicken into rolls. Serve with salad.
